meanings.definition: A puzzle consisting of a grid of squares to be filled in with numbers
meanings.sent1: I enjoy solving sudokus in the newspaper every morning.
meanings.sent2: She completed all the sudokus in the puzzle book.
meanings.sent3: The sudokus in the magazine were too challenging for me.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a complex network of interconnected sudokus.
meanings.sent5: The sudokus on the website had varying levels of difficulty.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'sudoku'
meanings.sent1: We decided to solve a few sudokus together after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out sudokus to each student in the class.
meanings.sent3: The kids raced to see who could finish their sudokus first.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the sound of pencils scratching on sudokus.
meanings.sent5: She collected sudokus from different magazines to solve over the weekend.
